title: Грязные Мысли
overview: "Gryaznyye Mysli" is the first media intellectual championship from ClickKlak and VK Video. Here you will see how the 8 best teams, who passed an incredibly difficult selection, will compete for the title of champion of the first season. By answering correctly, the team earns points. But if the answers are incorrect, then a bucket of dirt will turn over on the participants!
